definition[0]: to begin doing something or using something
example[0]: You’d better start on your homework.
definition[1]: to make someone start doing something regularly, especially because it will be good for them
example[1]: Try starting your baby on solid foods at four months old.
definition[2]: to begin criticizing someone or complaining to them about something
example[2]: Ray’s wife started on at him about spending too much time in the pub.
